Class DescriptionResource

java.lang.Object
  eu.ehri.extension.AbstractRestResource
      eu.ehri.extension.AbstractAccessibleEntityResource<DescribedEntity>
          eu.ehri.extension.DescriptionResource
All Implemented Interfaces:
TxCheckedResource
public class DescriptionResource
extends AbstractAccessibleEntityResource<DescribedEntity>

Provides a RESTful interface for dealing with described entities.

Author:
Mike Bryant (http://github.com/mikesname)
